The Facebook post from January 26: 2019, is linked to a headline titled: "South African woman job interview denied because she was pregnant - 2 weeks later, she fires back".
The same story can be found posted on a: which identifies the woman as Lindsey Wilson, a 24-year-old South African woman living in Durban.
A Google reverse image search of the pic: 2018, about a Lindsey Wilcox living in Florida. In the interview, Wilcox claims that a popular family diner in Florida denied her an interview because she was pregnant.
The woman in the interview does not ment: R12 million inheritance" as claimed in the misleading article.
